summary: This mod will add all the appearances of the "Fabulous Follower" series girls to the presets for their respective race in the character creation screen.
descriptionHtml:
[color=red]***********************************************************
I AM NOT ACTIVELY MODDING SKYRIM AT THE MOMENT.

Anything I created is free for use and derivitive work. None of mods were complete and I apologize that some of them were never finished. If someone wants to pick up where I left off, they are welcome to use my work by either uploading their own mod or I can give them access to that mod's page.

My custom work will continue as planned.

Thanks everyone for your support and hopefully I will come back soon. But alas, I have a seasonal job and until April 15th, I don't know how much time I will have, or when I do have time, if I'll want to return to skyrim modding.
*********************************************************** [/color]

This mod will add all the appearances of the "Fabulous Follower" series girls to the presets for their respective race in the character creation screen.

Fabulous Followers > Nords http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24495
Fabulous Followers >Bretons http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24619

PLEASE NOTE: Unlike my follower mod, you WILL need other beauty mods for the girls to look like they do in the screenshots. Here are links to them but there are also instructions on how to look exactly like the screenshots by using the files that came in the follower mod of the girl you want to 'be'

DIMONZED UNP female body - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709
Phygit's FemFeet - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3666
Enhanced Character Edit - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12951
Navetsea's CBBE/Thepal/UNP compatible skin pack - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6554
Fair Skin Complexion Sweaty Body UNP Version - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19666
envision Face - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7897
Pretty Face - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7887
UNP Delicate - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20530
The Eyes of Beauty - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722
numenume femalebrows - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7625#content

Those are links to the various beauty mods I used, but if you want to replicate the look of one girl in particular, take the meshes and textures from her directory in the follower mod (see link above) and overwrite the defaults for your race :D

Installation > Unzip the ESP to your data folder and make sure it is checked to load.

Uninstallation - deactivate and delete the .ESP

Known issues:

The hair for the girls will not be there unless you have Apachii SkyHair, and even if you do, you will have to scroll through and select it, but they arent too hard to find, especially since thier haircolor is already set correctly!

Other Mods:
